page.title: 15GREEN BELT AREAS
page.content: There are three public houses.One of them,the Folley Inn,has lately been closed down.The Beauchamp Arms is in a green belt area which means it can't be built on.The area has been in the green belt system for about twenty years.The New Inn is probably the biggest of the pubs and was built about 150 years ago.In the green belt area the houses are from 150_350 years old.They used to be thatched cottages that farm workers used to live in.Each house has around 1 acre of land and mostpeople have a vegetable patch.People who live in these houses don't usually live there formore than ten years because people moved on from farm to farm.
